header.title: Professional Plumber Â· Hero of the Mushroom Kingdom

summary: Experienced hero and plumber with over 35 years of rescuing princesses, defeating evil kings, and saving various kingdoms. Skilled in jumping, powerup utilization, and kart racing. Known for quick problem-solving skills and adaptability in face of diverse challenges. Always ready for a new adventure, whether it's in 2D or 3D!

experience.title: Chief Hero and Princess Rescuer
responsibilities: Successfully thwarted numerous kidnapping attempts by Bowser, ensuring the safety of Princess Peach.
Navigated through complex castle systems, overcoming various obstacles and enemies.
Mastered the use of power-ups such as Super Mushrooms, Fire Flowers, and Star Power to combat threats.

experience.title: Co-Founder & Master Plumber
responsibilities: Co-founded and operated a successful plumbing business with brother Luigi.
Specialized in pipe repair, drain cleaning, and mysterious underworld pipe system navigation.
Developed innovative techniques for coin collection and turtle shell repurposing.

presentation.title: Keynote Speaker on Advanced Jumping Techniques
responsibilities: Demonstrated various jumping techniques including the Triple Jump, Wall Jump, and Long Jump.
Discussed the history and evolution of enemy-stomping strategies in platform games.

presentation.title: Presenter for 'From 8-bit to HD: My Journey Through Video Game History'
responsibilities: Shared personal experiences of starring in video games across multiple generations and technological advancements.

writing.company: The Plumber's Guide to Saving Princesses
writing.title: AUTHOR
responsibilities: Wrote a comprehensive guide on princess-saving techniques, castle navigation, and boss battle strategies.

skills.value: Fireball throwing, Hammer wielding, Goomba stomping
Kart racing, Yoshi riding, Underwater navigation
Super Mushroom, Fire Flower, Super Star, Tanooki Suit
Coin collecting, Pipe travel, Princess rescuing, Mini-game mastery

education.title: MASTER'S DEGREE IN ADVANCED PLUMBING AND HEROICS
responsibilities: Graduated with honors. Received the Golden Plunger Award for excellence in practical applications.

extracurricular.title: All-Star Athlete
responsibilities: Participated in various sports including tennis, golf, soccer, and Olympic events.
Organized friendly competitions to promote sportsmanship across different kingdoms.

extracurricular.title: Founding Member
responsibilities: Led expeditions to discover and map out new warp pipe routes across multiple worlds.
Conducted research on the physics of pipe travel and its applications in modern transportation.
Mentored young adventurers in the art of safe and effective warp pipe navigation.
